"Bergmann": "When it's sunny, try getting up on the wall. You can get a great view."
"By the way, do you have a moment? There's something I wanted to ask you."
"You know about the Aerio region's many mountains, don't you? I used to climb them all the time."
"I used to be a frontline ARKS, fighting DOLLS day in, day out, but the injuries took a steep toll..."
"So now, I'm stuck down here in the lowlands, working in the city."
"For one reason or another, my workload has been mounting up lately, so I never get a chance to go outside any more."
"I've been thinking about where I'd like to go if I ever get some free time. I'd want to go somewhere I've been before, when I was still at peak performance."
"You're hiking around all over the place for your duties, aren't you? Could you climb this mountain and send me as much data on the scenery as you can?"
"Not that it's a high priority. Just whenever you have time."
"I see... You're busy too. I'll belay my request for some other time, then."
